title: Ep 111: The Universe vs. Christian
description:
Ep 111: The Universe has it out for Christian
Go to PRETTYLITTER.COM/JUDGIES to save 20% on your first order.
In This Episode :We learn some cool facts about Erika's grandma, we have a GF who looks at frogs to be reminded of her BF, we read a Tinder conversation that goes wrong, a GF refuses to go on a trip with her BF family, a college dude gets exposed from his tracking his favorite kind of nuts, and a listener gets caught trying to steal eggs from a picnic.

Get Judgies Merch Here:
https://www.bonfire.com/store/the-judgies-podcast/

Our Patreon is officially open, if you want to see extra content go check it out!

Intro Music by: Iván
